    • calculatePetAge

      public int calculatePetAge​(int years)
      this method calculates the pet's age in human years. The first year is equal to 15 years, the second to 9 years, and beyond, at a rate set by the child classes.
      Parameters:
      years - the user input years
      Returns:
      total the result of the calculation
